metadata.title: CVE-2017-12110 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in the xls_appendSSTfunction of libxls 1.4.A specially crafted XLS file can cause memorycorruption resulting in remote code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12110` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

r-cran-readxl - 1.0.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.0-2').
